channel.title: How to add a Sailing to brimhaven animation? [PI]
channel.description: Hey, For some traveling i need players to sail to brimhaven, i made a npc that teleported him to brimhaven, but now i need to add it it opens the animation of the Sailing. is this just like adding a normal animation? and what animation do i need to add? what ID
